site.title: BinBox Games
site.tagline: Welcome to the world of hypercasual mini games!
site.description: Enjoy various hypercasual mini web games!

hero.title: Choose and enjoy games!
hero.subtitle: Each game runs independently and you can switch to other games anytime.

footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 BinBox Games. Creating the world of hypercasual mini games.

barista_game.title: Barista Game
barista_game.description: Hold to pour coffee and release at perfect timing for high combos! Release at perfect timing to gain extra time!

auto_battle_card_game.title: Auto Battle Card Dual
auto_battle_card_game.subtitle: Turn-based Auto Battle Card Game!
auto_battle_card_game.page_title: Auto Battle Card Dual - BinBox Games
auto_battle_card_game.description: Turn-based auto battle card game! Strategically arrange your card order and use the synergy of 5 different elements to achieve victory!

ui.confirm_back_to_homepage: The current game progress will not be saved. Do you still want to return to the homepage?
ui.confirm_back_to_menu: The current game progress will not be saved. Do you still want to return to the menu screen?

status_effects.taunt_description: Only attack cards activate on the next turn. Cannot use defense or buff cards.
status_effects.stun_description: No cards activate on the next turn. Completely skips the turn.
status_effects.paralysis_description: 30% chance for no cards to activate. Skips that turn.
status_effects.phase_description: 30% chance for attacks to target yourself. You may attack yourself.
status_effects.burn_description: Takes 5 burn damage at turn start. Ignores defense.
status_effects.poisoned_description: Takes 5 poison damage at turn end.
status_effects.sand_description: Reduces attack card accuracy by 30%. Lasts for 2 turns.
status_effects.insult_description: Reduces defense card activation rate by 30%. Lasts for 2 turns.
status_effects.slow_description: Reduces status card activation rate by 30%. Lasts for 2 turns.
status_effects.chains_description: Strength buffs are not applied for 1 turn. Attack power is temporarily reduced.
status_effects.frozen_description: Attack card accuracy is reduced by 50%. Lasts for 1 turn.

random_bash.name: Random Bash
random_bash.description: Attack the opponent 3-5 times consecutively. Each hit deals 1 damage.

heavy_strike.name: Heavy Strike
heavy_strike.description: Deliver a powerful strike to the opponent, dealing 5 damage.

shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
shield_bash.description: Deal damage equal to your current {defense} to the opponent.

concussion.name: Concussion
concussion.description: Deal 2 damage to the opponent and have a chance to {status:stun} them.

counter_attack.name: Counter Attack
counter_attack.description: Deal damage equal to the last damage you took to the opponent.

crouch.name: Crouch
crouch.description: Add 30 {defense} to yourself and skip your turn.

thorn_armor.name: Thorn Armor
thorn_armor.description: Deal 1 damage to yourself and gain 2 {buff:strength}.

indomitable_gauntlet.name: Indomitable Gauntlet
indomitable_gauntlet.description: Deal 3 damage to yourself and gain 3 {buff:strength}.

scorched_shield.name: Scorched Shield
scorched_shield.description: Deal 3 damage to yourself and gain 13 {defense}.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: {status:taunt} the opponent. When {status:taunt}ed, only {cardType:attack} cards can be used.

flame_throw.name: Flame Throw
flame_throw.description: Throw flames at the enemy for 3 damage. Low chance to inflict {status:burn} on hit.

flame_burst.name: Flame Burst
flame_burst.description: Shoots flames at the opponent 1-3 times for 2 damage each, with a low chance to inflict {status:burn}.

flame_ascension.name: Flame Ascension
flame_ascension.description: Deal 5 damage to yourself, then deal 7 damage to the opponent and gain 1 {buff:strength} on hit. Has a chance to inflict {status:burn}.

bubble_strike.name: Bubble Strike
bubble_strike.description: Send bubbles to burst for 1 damage 2-5 times.

water_bomb.name: Water Bomb
water_bomb.description: Throw a water bomb at the opponent for 3 damage and a high chance to inflict {status:wet}.

tsunami.name: Tsunami
tsunami.description: Deal 15 damage to yourself, then deal 15 damage to the opponent. Both become {status:wet}.

freezing_wind.name: Freezing Wind
freezing_wind.description: Deal 10 damage per {status:wet} turn remaining to {status:wet} enemies. Can {status:frozen} for 1 turn.

ice_breaker.name: Ice Breaker
ice_breaker.description: Deal fixed damage equal to 20% of enemy's max {hp} to {status:frozen} enemies and remove {status:frozen} on hit.

thunder_strike.name: Thunder Strike
thunder_strike.description: Deliver a thunderous strike to the enemy.

short_circuit.name: Short Circuit
short_circuit.description: Base power is multiplied by 10 against {status:paralysis} enemies.

paralysis_trap.name: Paralysis Trap
paralysis_trap.description: Inflicts {status:paralysis} on the opponent for 1 turn.

lightning_storm.name: Lightning Storm
lightning_storm.description: Deal 3 damage to the enemy and randomly inflict one of {status:paralysis}, {status:burn}, or {status:wet} on hit.

smog.name: Smog
smog.description: Envelop the enemy in smog, dealing 2 damage with a chance to {status:poisoned}.

miracle_revival.name: Miracle Revival
miracle_revival.description: If current {hp} is below 30% of max {hp}, restore 50% of max {hp}.

push_back.name: Push Back
push_back.description: Push the opponent back and {status:stun} them.

sand_throw.name: Sand Throw
sand_throw.description: Throw {status:sand} in opponent's eyes, reducing {cardType:attack} card accuracy by 30% for 1 turn

mud_bath.name: Mud Bath
mud_bath.description: Pull opponent into muddy water, causing {status:sand} status for 1 turn.

cold_snap.name: Cold Snap
cold_snap.description: Freeze {status:wet} enemies, causing {status:frozen} status for 1 turn.

karura_strike.name: Karura Strike
karura_strike.description: A technique learned from the Karura clan. Deal 10 damage to yourself, then deal 12 damage to opponent and inflict {status:burn}.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: A powerful flame strike that deals 4 damage. Has a chance to inflict {status:burn}.

insult.name: Insult
insult.description: {status:insult}s the opponent, reducing {cardType:defense} card activation rate by 30% for 1 turn.

net_throw.name: Net Throw
net_throw.description: {status:slow}s the opponent, reducing {cardType:status} card activation rate by 30% for 1 turn.

oil_pour.name: Pour Oil
oil_pour.description: If the target is {status:burn}ed, extends {status:burn} by 2 turns.

chains_of_fire.name: Chains of Fire
chains_of_fire.description: Bind the opponent with {status:chains} of fire, preventing {buff:strength} buffs from applying for one turn.

endless_effort.name: Endless Effort
endless_effort.description: The source of strong power is endless effort. Adds 1 {buff:strength} to yourself.

sword_dance.name: Sword Dance
sword_dance.description: Increases {cardType:attack} card damage by 50% for one turn.

focus.name: Focus
focus.description: Increases {normal} {cardType:attack} card accuracy by 30% for one turn.

fast_attack.name: Fast Attack
fast_attack.description: Increases {normal} {cardType:attack} card activation count by 1 for one turn.

lava_prison.name: Lava Prison
lava_prison.description: If the opponent is {status:burn}ed, trap them in a lava prison, preventing any actions.

powder_keg.name: Powder Keg Throw
powder_keg.description: If the opponent is {status:burn}ed, explode to deal 10 damage and extend {status:burn} by 1 turn.

opportunity_scent.name: Opportunity's Scent
opportunity_scent.description: When opponent is {status:burn}ed, gain +10 damage to {fire} {cardType:attack} cards for 1 turn. {buff:scent} stacks.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.description: HP will not drop below 1 until the start of next turn. {buff:sharpen} does not stack.

hot_wind.name: Hot Wind
hot_wind.description: Deal 5 damage to yourself and gain {buff:hotWind} buff. {fire} {cardType:attack} cards gain bonus activations equal to {buff:hotWind} turns remaining.

battery_explosion.name: Battery Blast
battery_explosion.description: Gain {buff:lithium} for 1 turn. {fire} and {electric} {cardType:attack} cards' current damage is multiplied by {buff:lithium} remaining turns.

fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
fire_breath.description: For 1 turn, {fire} {cardType:buff} cards always activate successfully. {buff:breath} does not stack.

water_healing.name: Water Healing
water_healing.description: If you have {water} defense attribute, restore 8 {hp}.

skin_breathing.name: Skin Breathing
skin_breathing.description: Restore 6 {hp}. If you have {status:wet} status, healing triples.

healing_spring.name: Healing Spring
healing_spring.description: If you have {status:wet} status, restore 10 {hp} when activated.

liquify.name: Liquify
liquify.description: Liquify yourself to recover 50% of lost {hp}, remove {status:wet} status, and skip turn.

slash_water.name: Water Slash
slash_water.description: Looks like you slashed water, recover {hp} equal to the last damage taken.

rain.name: Rain
rain.description: Make it rain to apply {status:wet} to both yourself and opponent.

sleet.name: Sleet
sleet.description: If the enemy is {status:wet}, apply {status:slow} for 1 turn.

cold_burn.name: Cold Burn
cold_burn.description: If the enemy is {status:wet} or {status:frozen}, apply {status:burn} for 1 turn.

massive_weight.name: Massive Weight
massive_weight.description: For 1 turn, adds 20% of your current HP to {water}{cardType:attack} card base power. Gain {buff:mass} buff.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: For one turn, increases {water}{cardType:attack} card activation count by {buff:torrent} count.

moisture_absorption.name: Moisture Absorption
moisture_absorption.description: Gain Absorption +1. Restore {hp} equal to Absorption value at turn start. Healing doubles when {status:wet}.

conductive_armor.name: Conductive Armor
conductive_armor.description: When activated, gain {defense} equal to the opponent's current {defense}.

blinding_flash.name: Blinding Flash
blinding_flash.description: Inflicts {status:slow} on the opponent for 1 turn.

phase_shock.name: Phase Shock
phase_shock.description: Inflicts {status:phase} on the opponent for 1 turn.

buffs.strength_description: Deals 1 additional damage per stack when attacking. Can stack multiple times.
buffs.enhance_description: Increases attack card damage by 50%. Effect disappears after turn ends.
buffs.focus_description: Increases normal element attack card accuracy by 30%.
buffs.speed_description: Increases the activation count of normal element attack cards.
buffs.scent_description: Increases fire element attack card damage by 10 per stack.
buffs.sharpen_description: HP cannot go below 1 until next turn starts. Last stand effect.
buffs.hotWind_description: Increases fire element attack card activation count by remaining Hot Wind buff turns.
buffs.lithium_description: Fire and Electric element attack card damage is multiplied by remaining Li‚Å∫ turns.
buffs.breath_description: Fire element buff cards always activate successfully.
buffs.mass_description: Adds 20% of current HP to water element attack card power per stack. Lasts 1 turn.
buffs.torrent_description: Increases the activation count of water element attack cards.
buffs.absorption_description: Restore HP equal to Absorption value at turn start. Healing doubles when wet.

elements.fire_description: Represents Fire element cards. When defense element becomes Fire based on hand composition, you take 1.5x damage from Water attacks and 0.5x damage from Poison attacks. Immune to Burn status.
elements.water_description: Represents Water element cards. When defense element becomes Water based on hand composition, you take 1.5x damage from Electric attacks and 0.5x damage from Fire attacks.
elements.electric_description: Represents Electric element cards. When defense element becomes Electric based on hand composition, you take 1.5x damage from Poison attacks and 0.5x damage from Water attacks. Immune to Paralysis status.
elements.poison_description: Represents Poison element cards. When defense element becomes Poison based on hand composition, you take 1.5x damage from Fire attacks and 0.5x damage from Electric attacks. Immune to Poisoned status.
elements.normal_description: Represents Normal element cards. When defense element becomes Normal based on hand composition, you take equal damage from all elemental attacks.

card_types.attack_description: Cards that deal direct damage to enemies. Depletes defense first, then reduces HP. Elemental attack cards deal 1.5x, 1x, or 0.5x damage depending on the opponent's defense element.
card_types.defense_description: Cards that increase your defense to reduce incoming damage.
card_types.debuff_description: Cards that weaken the enemy's abilities.
card_types.status_description: Cards that inflict negative effects like stun, burn, or poison on enemies.

stats.defense_description: Defense that reduces incoming damage. When attacked, defense is consumed first, and HP decreases only when defense reaches 0.
stats.hp_description: Character's life force. Defeat occurs when it reaches 0.

defense_element_descriptions.fire: Fire defense attribute active. Take 1.5x damage from Water attacks, 0.5x from Poison attacks.
defense_element_descriptions.water: Water defense attribute active. Take 1.5x damage from Electric attacks, 0.5x from Fire attacks.
defense_element_descriptions.electric: Electric defense attribute active. Take 1.5x damage from Poison attacks, 0.5x from Water attacks.
defense_element_descriptions.poison: Poison defense attribute active. Take 1.5x damage from Fire attacks, 0.5x from Electric attacks.
defense_element_descriptions.normal: Normal defense attribute active. Take 1x damage from all elemental attacks.

ui.crouch_effect: Crouched for defense and skipped turn
ui.thorn_armor_effect: Thorn armor dealt damage to self

card_selection.instruction: Choose an attack card to start the game!

ui.choose_next_card: Choose a card for the next stage
ui.reward_options: Add to the left of your hand, replace one of your hand cards, or skip the reward
ui.choose_card_to_replace: Choose a hand card to replace
ui.click_to_select_doubleclick_for_detail: Click to select, double-click for details

tutorial.line1: Select one attack card to start the game!
tutorial.line2: Cards activate automatically from left to right in your hand!
tutorial.line3: After clearing each stage, choose one of three randomly appearing cards to add to the left of your hand!
tutorial.line4: Maximum hand size is 10 cards! When clearing stages, you can choose to add a card, replace cards in your hand, or skip to the next stage!
tutorial.line5: How many stages can you reach? Test your luck!
tutorial.normal_note: üíØ Normal type has no strengths/weaknesses (1.0x damage to all)
tutorial.defense_line1: ‚Ä¢ Your defense element is automatically determined by your hand cards
tutorial.defense_line2: ‚Ä¢ The most common element in your hand becomes your defense type
tutorial.defense_line2_1: ‚Ä¢ Even with multiple Normal cards, one elemental card will change defense to that element
tutorial.defense_line3: ‚Ä¢ Elements with equal card counts cancel out, resulting in Normal element
tutorial.defense_line6: ‚Ä¢ Normal defense takes 1.0x damage from all element attacks (no strengths/weaknesses)
tutorial.immunity_description: When your defense element matches the element type, you become completely immune to related status effects
tutorial.immunity_note: üí° Immunity effects change immediately when defense element changes
